title: 'Problem toh hai..': Jhanak's Chandni Sharma on DATING Krushal Ahuja & unfollowing him on Instagram - India Forums
summary:
Chandni Sharma Opens Up About Unfollowing Krushal Ahuja Amid Dating Rumors

Published: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 1:35 PM | Source: India Forums

Chandni Sharma and Krushal Ahuja have made headlines after unfollowing each other on Instagram, raising questions about their rumored relationship. A close insider revealed that their relationship ended sourly, prompting the social media split.

  • Chandni and Krushal, co-stars on the show Jhanak, have unfollowed each other on Instagram.
  • They were previously rumored to be in a relationship that reportedly ended poorly.
  • Chandni confirmed the unfollowing, citing privacy in their personal matters, but praised Krushal's professionalism.
  • She denied any dating rumors, insisting they were never romantically involved.
  • Fans are hopeful for their reconciliation on-screen despite personal tensions.
“Yes, we have unfollowed each other. There is a problem, and that's the reason we did so. However, we both want to keep this matter private.” - Chandni Sharma

Despite the personal fallout, both actors continue to hold professional respect for each other, leaving fans hoping for a positive resolution.

title: Shalini Passi says she married at 20, had a son at 21 but had one important condition for husband: ‘He should not…’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Shalini Passi: Marrying Young and Having a Child at 21, with No Regrets

Date: 2024-12-01, Source: Indian Express

Shalini Passi, known for her appearances in 'Fabulous Lives vs Bollywood Wives,' has shared her perspective on getting married at 20 and becoming a mother at 21. In an interview with Mojo Story, she expressed no regrets about her decision, describing it as a 'great move by the universe.'

  1. Shalini had an arranged marriage with Sanjay Passi, the owner of the PASCO group, after his family spotted her at a wedding.
  2. She had a condition for her arranged marriage: her husband should not drink, smoke, or gamble.
  3. Despite initial challenges, Shalini mastered the art of hosting and adapted to her new lifestyle.
  4. She is known for her love for art and philanthropic work.
“It was a very good move by the universe because I had so much energy and enthusiasm back then. What happens with women is later in their life, the energy and recovery gets extremely different. When young, you recover early. I became a mom at 21. Because I was young, I used to get more excited than my son when I took him to a toy store. Its like I am almost living my life in reverse.”

Shalini Passi reflects on her young marriage and motherhood, emphasizing her enthusiasm and energy during that period.
newTitle: Shalini Passi: Marrying Young at 20, Motherhood at 21, and Zero Regrets

title: Shweta Tiwari Reacts To Palak Tiwari And Ibrahim Ali Khan Dating Rumours: 'They Will Forget...' - News18
summary:
Shweta Tiwari Unfazed by Palak Tiwari and Ibrahim Ali Khan's Dating Rumors

Date & Source: Last Updated: December 30, 2024, 17:51 IST

Actress Shweta Tiwari has reacted to the persistent dating rumors surrounding her daughter, Palak Tiwari, and actor Ibrahim Ali Khan. While the two have repeatedly dismissed the rumors, Shweta has now revealed that she no longer lets such speculations bother her.

In a recent interview, Shweta expressed her indifference towards the rumors, stating that people's memory spans are short and that negativity sells in the media. She also mentioned that she has dealt with similar situations in the past and has learned to not let them affect her.

Palak and Ibrahim's dating rumors first surfaced in 2022 when they were photographed together. However, they have maintained that they are just friends. Palak, in an interview with Siddharth Kannan, clarified that they were with a group of people when they were snapped together and that there was no romantic involvement between them.

On the work front, Palak was last seen in Salman Khan's Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan.

title: Sangeeta Bijlani confirms she almost married Salman Khan, says ex didn’t let her wear short dress: ‘I changed that part of my life’ - The Indian Express
summary:

Publication Date: Not specified

Source: The Indian Express

Sangeeta Bijlani reminisces about her long relationship with Salman Khan, revealing they were on the verge of marriage before he called it off at the last minute. She discusses the restrictions placed on her during their relationship and expresses how she has changed since then.

  • Sangeeta Bijlani dated Salman Khan for nearly a decade.
  • The couple had finalized their wedding plans before Salman called it off.
  • Bijlani shared her past restrictions on clothing choices imposed by her ex.
  • She expressed a desire to change that restrictive period of her life.
  • Bijlani confirmed that wedding invitations were printed before their breakup.
“I was very constricted that ‘you can’t wear short dresses... I was a little shy then. Now, I am a total gundi.” - Sangeeta Bijlani

In conclusion, Sangeeta Bijlani reflects on her past relationship with Salman Khan, acknowledging how she has transformed and embraced her individuality since those years.

title: Hidden Love actor Zhao Lusi's pic in wheelchair goes viral, team shares statement - India Today
summary:
Chinese Actress Zhao Lusi Hospitalized: Team Suspends Work for Recovery

Published on Dec 30, 2024, by Zinia Bandyopadhyay

Chinese actress Zhao Lusi, known for her role in Hidden Love, was recently hospitalized, sparking concerns over her health. Her team shared a statement announcing a suspension of all work commitments to allow for a speedy recovery.

  • Zhao was seen in a wheelchair as she was rushed to the hospital on December 18, with footage of the incident going viral on social media.
  • Speculations about her health have been circulating, with online rumors pointing to severe depression or a neurological condition, possibly due to work-related stress.
  • Zhao's management confirmed she has suspended all work commitments due to a health crisis but withheld details about her condition.
"After Ms. Zhao Lusi confirmed to play the role of Ruan Yu in the project 'Lovers', she actively carried out preparatory work and fulfilled the purpose of the contract. [...] We will prioritise the health of Ms. Zhao Lusi and suspend all subsequent work. We also hope that everyone who cares about Lusi will give her space to rest physically and mentally."

Zhao, 26, began her acting journey in 2017 and has starred in hit series like The Romance of Tiger and Rose, Dating in the Kitchen, Love Better Than Immortality, Love Like the Galaxy, and Hidden Love.
newTitle: Chinese Actress Zhao Lusi Hospitalized: Team Suspends Work for Recovery

title: Only 1 Indian actor made it to The Independent's list of Best Actors of 21st century. It's not Shah Rukh Khan, Amitabh - Hindustan Times
summary:
The Independent listed 60 best actors of the 21st century. Not Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan or Amitabh Bachchan, but this Indian actor made the cut.

Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: The Independent

The Independent has curated a list of the 60 best actors of the 21st century. Notably, the list includes international talents while specifically excluding performances from films released after 2000.

  • Irrfan Khan is the only Indian actor to be featured on the list, ranked at #41.
  • Other prominent Indian actors such as Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, and Amitabh Bachchan are absent from this list.
  • The late actor celebrated for his roles in films such as The Warrior, Haasil, and Life of Pi.
  • Philip Seymour Hoffman was recognized as the best actor, with female representation by Emma Stone, ranked at #2.
“It’s Irrfan Khan’s eyes, hooded and deep brown, that will live eternally. They granted him the ability to weave magic, to recite poetry without moving his lips.”

The recognition of Irrfan Khan amidst international talents highlights his impactful performances and legacy in cinema.
newTitle: Irrfan Khan Among The Best Actors of 21st Century According to The Independent

title: Max (Kannada) Box Office Collection Day 5 - Sacnilk
EXCLUSIVE: Sanjay Leela Bhansali signs KD director Prem for Rowdy Rathore 2; Scripting in progress - PINKVILLA
summary:
Sanjay Leela Bhansali Signs Director Prem for Rowdy Rathore 2; Scripting in Progress

Date & Source: Dec 30, 2024 | 02:59 PM IST | Pinkvilla

Over the years, there has been constant chatter on the sequel to Akshay Kumar’s 2012 blockbuster, Rowdy Rathore, which was produced by Sanjay Leela Bhansali and directed by Prabhudeva. Several names have been floating around in the media to carry forward this cop-based action entertainer. Now, we have exclusively learned that Sanjay Leela Bhansali has signed Kannada film director Prem and has entrusted him with the responsibility of developing the script for Rowdy Rathore 2.

According to sources close to the development, Sanjay Leela Bhansali is very excited to bankroll the sequel to Rowdy Rathore and had locked the core plot of the film a while back. The basic idea of Rowdy Rathore 2 has been in place for the longest time, and SLB was looking to partner with the right forces to develop a banger of a sequel to this 2012 blockbuster. His thoughts have aligned with Prem, and the duo is working towards developing the script of Rowdy Rathore 2.

The source further added that the Rowdy Rathore sequel will move into the casting stage once the screenplay is locked. Prem will full-fledgedly move into the pre-production of Rowdy Rathore 2 after the release of KD – The Devil. The film is expected to take off sometime by the end of 2025, and the casting will begin from Summer next year. Right now, the energies are being invested to develop a script that does justice to the legacy of the first part.

Will Akshay Kumar return to Rowdy Rathore 2? "We shall know that at the right time. It could be Akshay Kumar, a new hero, or who knows, a two-hero film too," the source concluded.
newTitle: Sanjay Leela Bhansali Signs Director Prem for Rowdy Rathore 2; Scripting in Progress

summary:

They have been spotted together in the city and at social gatherings, and it was recently speculated that they were holidaying together in the Maldives. Shweta Tiwari has now reacted to these dating rumors.

"Rumours don’t bother me anymore... As per rumours, my daughter is dating every third guy, and I am getting married every year. As per the internet, I am already married thrice. These things don’t affect me now."

  • Odela expresses his disbelief at working with Chiranjeevi, citing a lifelong admiration.
  • He emphasizes that viewers will not see the traditional vintage Megastar.

title: Pawan finds no fault with both Allu Arjun, Revanth.. - Greatandhra
summary:
Pawan Kalyan Addresses Sandhya Theatre Incident Without Blame

Publication Date: December 4, 2023

Source: Great Andhra

Pawan Kalyan, the Jana Sena Party president and Andhra Pradesh's deputy chief minister, spoke on the tragic Sandhya Theatre stampede incident that resulted in the death of a woman and the hospitalization of her son, choosing not to assign blame to individuals involved.

  • Pawan Kalyan expressed that excitement for film stars can lead to overwhelming situations and reiterated that Allu Arjun should not be criticized for his behavior during the incident.
  • He emphasized the importance of proper precautions during such events and noted that the situation could have been managed better.
  • Kalyan highlighted the need for artists to show empathy towards affected individuals, suggesting that Allu Arjun should have taken steps to support the victims shortly after the incident occurred.
  • He acknowledged the police's efforts in maintaining security during events and praised the leadership of Revanth Reddy.
  • The deputy chief minister mentioned that in the film industry, collaboration is key and stressed that attributing sole blame to Allu Arjun is unfair.
Pawan Kalyan stated, “In cinema, it's a team effort, and everyone should be a part of it. In this case, Allu Arjun has been made the sole culprit, which I believe is not right.”

The discussion highlighted the need for better management of crowd situations at public events and the responsibilities of public figures in ensuring safety.
newTitle: Pawan Kalyan Addresses Sandhya Theatre Incident Without Blame
